features: OIL FREE MOISTURIZER: Formulated with fruit stem cell complex with argan stem cells, acai berry, & kombucha probiotics to nourish & fortify skin with oil-free hydration for a clear, balanced complexion.

CLEAR SKIN: Fight blemishes naturally with Andalou Naturals Clear Skin Range, formulated with Argan Stem Cells, Kombucha Probiotics, & Willow Bark to remove excess oil, & banish blemish causing bacteria.
INGREDIENTS FROM NATURE: We support Superior Source Ingredient Standards & only use ingredients that are organic, non-GMO, gluten free, sustainable, fair trade, cruelty free, & nature-derived.

FRUIT STEM CELL SCIENCE: Every Andalou Natural's product—including masks, creams, serums, moisturizers, cleansers, & toners—use nature's antioxidant defense solution to protect & support healthy skin & hair.
Andalou Naturals: Non-GMO remains a core brand value of Andalou Naturals and we continue to source superior non-GMO ingredients for our products

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Citrus Kombucha Cleansing Gel Lemon Sugar Facial Scrub Willow Bark Pure Pore Toner Willow Bark Pure Pore Serum Acai + Kombucha Oil-Free Moisturizer Argan Stem Cell Recovery Cream Benefit Whisks away excess oil and dull, dry surface cells for a clear, balanced complexion. Gently exfoliates dull, dry surface cells for improved tone and texture. Instantly hydrates with skin calming nutrients. Purifies pores, curbs bacteria, absorbs excess oil, and fades the appearance of post-blemish pigmentation. Soothes & conditions with oil-free hydration. Deeply hydrates and calms inflammation for a clear, balanced complexion.

Key Ingredients Argan Stem Cells Argan Stem Cells capture Nature's Intelligence in every product. Willow Bark Willow Bark helps to cleanse and purify pores. Aloe Vera Ultra-hydrating Aloe Vera uplifts skin's protective moisture barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best facial moisturizer I’ve ever used
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this moisturizer for 2 years now. I discovered Andalou products & this specific one while doing a desperate search for a non-greasy moisturizer that wouldn’t clog my pores. I stumbled upon a gem. That’s for sure! ❤️ I have naturally very oily prone skin & every product I used prior to this gave me pimples, blemishes, & also made my skin more oily. I used to never walk out of the house without my makeup on. Now I feel confident enough to go bare faced. My skin is smooth, no redness, no dark spots, & the perfect balance & texture. Just perfect smooth skin. I do believe this helps w/ some anti aging as well. I’m 35 & my skin honestly looks better than it did in my late 20s. I am forever grateful for this moisturizer. As silly as that may sound. I am grateful because I was about to give up on my skincare all together before Andalou. If you’re doubting trying this, please don’t! You will not regret your purchase! A bonus is that there are no harsh chemicals in this moisturizer or any Andalou products! 😀. I am gaining absolutely nothing by leaving this review. I am just truly grateful that I discovered this & made the purchase back in 2021. I haven’t used anything else since. Not only has this gotten my oily skin under control but it has evened out any dark spots & redness I had before. If you struggle w/ any of the issues I mentioned above, it is totally worth the price for this tube. This bottle lasts me about a month or so. It is a small price to pay for beautiful skin. I will also start trying out their other products as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good feel, no grease, no tension!
reviews.reviewText: Since the days of Proactiv oil-free moisture, I have been changed-- I can no longer handle any kind of oil in my moisturizer. It makes shine, it feels greasy and I just can't handle it. For many years I used Biore oil free moisture, but they stopped making it. Since then I've been on a bit of a journey to find a replacement product, and this is one of two (from the same company) that I've been satisfied with. The texture of the product leans toward the thick side rather than watery/runny.If you visit the company's website, the product description tells a little more, describing it as clarifying and mattifying. I can agree with the latter, but haven't had it long enough to comment on the clarifying. My skin is pretty sensitive so that's yet another variable I have to consider when using an oil free moisturizer and in this case, so far, so good.I've been pleased with the value and product size, function and all aspects so far. I also like the size/shape of the container and the pump. It's just thick enough that I'm concerned about how it will continue to pump as it gets low, but we'll see.Pleased, and no concerns recommending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light moisturizer that works!
reviews.reviewText: I have oily/combination skin and it's always a struggle trying to find a moisturizer that hydrates, is lightweight and doesn't add shine and create excess oil. I've been using this moisturizer for about 3 weeks and I love it! It goes on easy, non-greasy, doesn't cause my skin to break-out. It has a faint scent that smells wonderful! Absolutely love this moisturizer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using this for years.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this moisturizer for years. In fact, I use many of the products in this line. It's great for my sensitive, 34 year old, acne-prone skin. It's lightweight but moisturizing enough to use year-round. My partner (38 year old man) even started using it; he used to not use moisturizer because he thought it would make him look greasy. I explained to him how forgoing moisturizer actually leaves your skin dehydrated, and that dehydration leads the skin to produce more oil in an effort to alleviate the dryness. Since he started using it, he doesn't get greasy. :) So we'll both keep using this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for people with oily skin!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! I bought it because I wanted a lotion that wouldn't make my skin look/feel oilier, and this product does the job! It feels very lightweight and gives my skin a matte-ish look/feel. The only area where this product lacks (and only very slightly) is in the moisturizing part. It does moisturize my skin, but I do feel the need to add a little of my heavy-duty moisturizer in certain parts of my face after using this. Granted, I have combination skin, so there are areas of my skin that are very dry (and I also live in the desert, so that doesn't help!). All in all, I love this product and would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a natural way to moisturize without adding to the shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer and find no issues with the product I received from Amazon. I’ve tried a few different moisturizers for my sensitive skin and this is the tried and true winner. The smell is light. The bottle easily lasts 6+ months and it wears lightweight. Most importantly, my skin feels nourished and calm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It made my entire face breakout. No returns so I'll gift it or throw it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love it! It’s moisturizing and non-greasy. I use it before bedtime after I have applied facial oil and don’t want to have a greasy face. I use a moisturizer with SPF from this wonderful company during the day.

It felt great on the skin. I have oily skin and it wasn't too heavy but it didn't feel too light. And I personally liked the smell. I usually only go for unscented because I don't like the smell of most products but this was nice.

reviews.reviewTitle: No irrita mi piel sensible con rosacea
reviews.reviewText: Es la única crema que no me causa irritacion cuando estoy sufriendo crisis de rosacea, no hidrata tanto pero si lo suficiente y no es para nada grasosa la piel queda relativamente mate, huele como a cítrico pero no molesta y la compraría de nuevo mil veces pero el lo que me detiene es el precio aunque con poquito alcanza para toda la cara.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 20, 2015
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely in LOVE with this product! It makes my skin feel fresh and alive in a way that no other product ever has!My skin is all over the place - slightly oily, somewhat breakout prone, somewhat sensitive, but also moderately dehydrated, with some minor flaking. This product sinks in quickly and doesn't make me shiny, but doesn't dry my skin out like some mattifying moisturisers do. It does exactly what it says - offers light hydration.At the moment, it doesn't offer quite enough hydration for me since it's winter and my skin is dehydrated, but I imagine a hydrating serum underneath would work well. I imagine it will be perfect on its own during the summer.It's also worth mentioning that the consistency is a thin serumy white cream, not a gel. I'd definitely recommend this moisturiser as long as you don't have very dry skin!

Endlich hab ich eine ölfreie Feuchtigkeitscreme gefunden die nur aus Naturstoffen besteht und natürlich ohne Tierversuche hergestellt wurde. Sie hinterlässt keinen Film auf der Haut, riecht gut und ist für Mischhaut super.
I really like this moisturizer. I've been using it for years. It's light weight, yet keeps skin soft. Totally not greasy. Absorbs well. Very light scent that doesn't linger at all.
